definition: Book of Leviticus/Third Book of Moses
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未记的头七章总共列出了多少种献祭？

sentences.english: Open up to Leviticus 16 to see an Old Testament picture of forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 打开利未记16章，看一张旧约恕罪的图片。

sentences.english: In Leviticus, He's the high Priest.
NKJV Some think that Paul overthrew all that God said in Lev. 11.
sentences.chinese: 粗心读者以为保罗在此推翻了利未记11章的教训。

sentences.english: Leviticus closes with instructions regarding conversation and conduct in the land.
sentences.chinese: 利未记结束于上帝对以色列民在应许之地言行的教导。

sentences.english: And Leviticus is a primary document of the Priestly School.
sentences.chinese: 利未记》是祭司学派的基础读物。

sentences.english: The 11th chapter of Leviticus deals with the dietary laws.
sentences.chinese: 利未记》11章是关于犹太教的饮食教规的。
